title: Type releases, worth noting (8.8).
content:
Selected newly released typefaces/type families and fonts, for the  
month of August, 2008.

Sans: [Apparata](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416065651/http:/www.behance.net/Gallery/apparata-beta_0/120228 "Apparata"), by Xavier Lanau _( [Serialize](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416065651/http:/serialize.es/ "Serialize"))_.  
Serif: [Amitale](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416065651/http:/bergsland.org/font.amitale.html "Amitale"), by David Bergsland.  
Display: [Bankas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416065651/http:/prop-a-ganda.com/bankas.php "Bankas"), by Ryoichi Tsunekawa _(Prop-A-Ganda)_.  
Script: [Nanette](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416065651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fajardo/nanette/ "Nanette"), by James Fajardo.  
Dingbat: [Roundabats](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416065651/http:/www.gasoligne.com/font_roundabats_fr.htm "Roundabats"), by Gasoligne.  
Free: [Ventisei](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416065651/http:/for.ma/blog/?p=233 "Ventisei"), by Dav(id) Hubner _(formlos)_. ;)

_[for.ma/blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416065651/http:/for.ma/blog)_
author: Dav

comments.content:
Apparata looks promising, thanks.

PS  
At first sight i've read "worth nothing", hehe.
